page.title: 05EMPLOYMENT IN EPSOM
page.content: {Epsom and Ewell Borough}is a leading centre in the county of Surrey and out of a population of 69,400 the work force is over 20,000. 60% of the people who live here work outside the borough. 80% of those who work here are employed in the service sector. {Unemployment}in the borough usually runs at just under 2000. {The main industrial location in Epsom {is the Longmead Industrial Estate where Epsom Coaches are a major employer. Other major employers include the W.S. Atkins Group, engineering consultants; Vestec Ltd., manufacturers of pressure vessels; Arrow Computer Systems; Bredero, Mitchell and Osbourne, building contractors; and Petrofina, a petrochemical group.
